messages.message: Incompatible KTXglFormat and VkFormat. If KTXglFormat is present vkFormat must be VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED.
messages.details: vkFormat is VK_FORMAT_R16G16B16_UINT but it must be VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED if KTXglFormat is present.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
